ygData.subject: Re: No More Sash Cheats...
ygData.msgSnippet: This is correct.  I just turned in my Red Headband items last night, with some trepidation.  I was terrified that the trainer would not hand over the headband,
ygData.messageBody:
This is correct. I just turned in my Red Headband items last night, with some trepidation. I was terrified that the trainer would not hand over the headband, but it did work.

He asks you to find Brother Dareb and Brother Shen. If they are not alive, bring back their remains (Dareb's Skull, Head of Shen) along with those of Ghanex Drah (Head). Turn those in along with your Orange Headband. I handed them to the Trainer in that order and was rewarded with the red headband. The faction adjustments included that of the Silent Fist Clan as well as the Ashen Order, with a couple of others.

I guess I was one of the lucky ones who managed to get both the headband and sash quests going before they 'Lored' the guild notes.

:(

Hang in their Brothers and Sisters




---------- Original Message ----------------------------------
From: "Noah D. Burt" <noahburt@...>
Reply-to: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
Date: Wed, 25 Aug 1999 08:16:10 -0700 (PDT)

>From: "Noah D. Burt" <noahburt@...>
>
>I believe he asks you to bring back Dareb. If you ask
>him about Dareb (or whoever he told youto bring back)
>he will explain that one went looking for another monk
>and that if they perished to bring back their remains
>so that they can be honored with burial. You shouldn't
>need to speak with anyone else. Good journeys and my
>truth guide you.
>Brother Kingdok
>Ashen Order monk of Twentieth Season on Erollisi Marr
>Man at Arms of Magius Knights
>Desperately seeking surname
>
>--- "Dizzy J." <dizzyj@...> wrote:
